Text:
This is Vol 1 ready for upload. I do have Vol 2 and Vol 3 as well. Just let me know if any is interested and I will upload them too.

I only ask for more flyfishing films on the bay and kindly ask you guys to upload if you have any films. Please upload as Video_TS or ISO.

Rios modern speycasting(3dvd) is the most wanted one.

Nice!
Please upload more on Fly Fishing!

Jessess

I have uploaded several popular flyfishing DVD films this year and there could be more to come. I buy these films and have no problem to share on the bay. But I would like to see other members do uploads too. In particular I would like to see Rios modern speycasting(3DVD) uploaded as ISO's or Video_TS's but other flyfishingfilms are wanted to. Please do so and I will be happy too. Looking forward to browse flyfishing movies from now on. Looking forward to hear from other members, thanks. Victor

Enjoy and remember to keep seeding for a long time.
I am awaiting comments and/or other uploads before I start seeding the really good volumes 2 and 3. Looking forward to see what will happen.

Victor
